name: XHPJS
description: Easily create JS controllers for XHP elements, and XHP wrappers for React elements

scripts.build: npm run build:exampleBundle && npm run build:exampleJSX
scripts.build:exampleBundle: browserify -r XHPJS -r react -r MyJSController -r MyJSModule -r MyReactClass -o example/build/bundle.js

author: Fred Emmott
